When set to true, the static constructor of the WorkflowServer class subscribes to the Tracing.NeedContextInformation event to set the CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId.ToString() value to the NeedContextInformationEventArgs.ContextInformation property. Set ExtendTraceLog to false to disable this behavior. The default is true.
